comment: The Principle of Well-Founded Recursion, part 2 of 3. Next, we show that the value of ` F ` at any ` X e. A ` is ` G ` recursively applied to all "previous" values of ` F ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Apr-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
